title: [WORK] Ep. 221 Career Planning in 2022: Trends + Tips with Mark Herschberg
description:
Get your own copy of Ashley’s new book You Turn at youturnbook.com!

 

Do you have a career plan for your future?

 

This week Ash talks with Mark Herschberg an author and professor from MIT all about how to build a career plan and execute on this vision. 

 

Mark and Ash dive straight into all things career: what to consider when creating a plan in the new year, formal tools on negotiation, and the single tip for authentic networking (it isn’t what you would think!)

 

If you are ready for a career shift in the new year or want to continue to grow in your current role, Mark shares valuable insights, you don’t want to miss. 

 

In This Episode, You’ll Learn:

  1. Whether job-hopping is a fit for your current career path or not.
  2. The tools to build a career plan for your year ahead.
  3. How to overcome Zoom fatigue and enjoy virtual work again.
  4. Networking insights to build deep relationships.
  5. What a peer learning group is and what you will gain by joining one.
